SELECT T2.SAP_MAT_CD /* SAP코드 */ , T1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목코드 */ , T2.PD_NM /* 품목명 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = 'BS' THEN T1.QTY END) AS BS_QTY /* 당월BS */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = '1' AND T1.ASN_TN_N = 1 THEN T1.QTY END) AS INDI_QTY1 /* 개인1차 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = '1' AND T1.ASN_TN_N = 2 THEN T1.QTY END) AS INDI_QTY2 /* 개인2차 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = '1' AND T1.ASN_TN_N = 3 THEN T1.QTY END) AS INDI_QTY3 /* 개인3차 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = '2' AND T1.ASN_TN_N = 1 THEN T1.QTY END) AS INDE_QTY1 /* 독립1차 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = '2' AND T1.ASN_TN_N = 2 THEN T1.QTY END) AS INDE_QTY2 /* 독립2차 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = '2' AND T1.ASN_TN_N = 3 THEN T1.QTY END) AS INDE_QTY3 /* 독립3차 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB IN ('1', '2') THEN T1.QTY END) AS QOM_ASN_QTY /* 물량배정 */ , ( SELECT PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO = '100002' AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) AS QTY_100002 /* 파주재고 */ , ( SELECT PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO = '100008' AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) AS QTY_100008 /* 성수재고 */ , ( SELECT SUM(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO IN ('100002', '100008') AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) AS LGST_QTY /* 물류재고 */ , ( SELECT SUM(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ S1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S2 ON S2.WARE_NO = S1.WARE_NO WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND S2.WARE_DV_CD = '3' AND S2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30' AND S1.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) AS CENTER_QTY /* 영업센터 조직재고 */ , ( SELECT SUM(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ S1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S2 ON S2.WARE_NO = S1.WARE_NO WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND S2.WARE_DV_CD = '3' AND S2.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '31' AND S1.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) AS CENTER_INDI_QTY /* 영업센터 개인재고 */
, ( SELECT NVL(SUM(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY), 0) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO IN ('100002', '100008') AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) - SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = 'BS' THEN T1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS LGST_LACK_QTY /* 물류부족재고 */ , NVL( ( SELECT PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO = '100008' AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ), 0 ) - SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB = 'BS' THEN T1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS LACK_QTY_100008 /* 성수부족재고 */
, ( SELECT NVL(SUM(PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY), 0) FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO IN ('100002', '100008') AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ) - SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB IN ('1', '2') THEN T1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS LGST_LACK_QTY /* 물류부족재고 */ , NVL( ( SELECT PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NO = '100008' AND ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD ), 0 ) - SUM(CASE WHEN T1.GB IN ('1', '2') THEN T1.QTY ELSE 0 END) AS LACK_QTY_100008 /* 성수부족재고 */
FROM ( SELECT '1' AS GB , D1.ASN_TN_N , D1.ITM_PD_CD , D1.CNFM_QTY AS QTY FROM TB_SVST_ITM_QOM_ASN_IZ D1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D2 ON D2.PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '31' /* 개인창고 */ AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND D1.OSTR_WARE_NO IN ('100002', '100008') /* 파주, 성수 물류센터 */ AND D1.ASN_OJ_YM = #{asnOjYm}
AND D2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd}
AND D1.ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
AND D1.ASN_TN_N = 1
AND D1.ASN_TN_N = 2
AND D1.ASN_TN_N = 3
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (1, 2)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (1, 3)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (2, 3)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (1, 2, 3)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS GB , D1.ASN_TN_N , D1.ITM_PD_CD , D1.CNFM_QTY AS QTY FROM TB_SVST_ITM_QOM_ASN_IZ D1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D2 ON D2.PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '32' /* 독립창고 */ AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND D1.OSTR_WARE_NO IN ('100002', '100008') /* 파주, 성수 물류센터 */ AND D1.ASN_OJ_YM = #{asnOjYm}
AND D2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd}
AND D1.ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
AND D1.ASN_TN_N = 1
AND D1.ASN_TN_N = 2
AND D1.ASN_TN_N = 3
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (1, 2)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (1, 3)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (2, 3)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N IN (1, 2, 3)
AND D1.ASN_TN_N NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
UNION ALL SELECT 'BS' AS GB , 0 AS ASN_TN_N , D1.PART_PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD , D1.PART_USE_QTY AS QTY FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ D1 /* 고객서비스정기BS주기내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ D2 /* 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON D2.CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND D2.CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.ITM_KND_CD IN ('5', '6') AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD <> '303' /* 계약취소 */ AND D2.IST_DT IS NOT NULL AND D2.REQD_DT IS NULL AND D2.CPS_DT IS NULL AND D1.VST_DUEDT LIKE #{asnOjYm} || '%'
AND D1.PART_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}
AND D1.ITM_KND_CD = #{bsItmKndCd}
) T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T2.PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD WHERE T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_TP_CD = 'M'
AND T1.GB <> '2'
AND T1.GB <> '1'
AND T1.GB NOT IN ('1', '2')
GROUP BY T2.SAP_MAT_CD, T1.ITM_PD_CD, T2.PD_NM ORDER BY T1.ITM_PD_CD
